title: Lilin - Aeon of Scorn (2013)
description:
[img]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b30/BAPHOM3T_666/cover_zpsfab99863.jpg[/img]

Lilin from Cincinnati, Ohio, was started by Troll and Draugr in November 2007 as a two-man Black Metal project with Troll on drums and guitar and Draugr on vocals and rhythm guitar. The two only recorded one song before being joined by Nero Lord on guitar. After that, Draugr swiched to playing bass while still doing lead vocals. 
As of very early 2013 Lilin has been set on making Raw American Black Metal filled with misanthropy, rebellion, rage, and SCORN set to kick off a new wave in American black metal.

Aeolous - Guitars
Baratrum - Vocals
Troll - Drums, Vocals (backing) (2007-present), Guitars (2007-present)
Nero Lord - Guitar, Vocals (backing) (2007-present)
